comment.author: 54339618@N00
comment._content: This house is located on the east side of Green St between Dundas & Thomas. It has an enclosed porch on the front now.

comment.author: 23121382@N07
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/54339618@N00] Thanks very much for the update - with your help I found the house on Google Street View and I've updated the description accordingly.
